James

Langford

Full Stack Web Developer

About

Since I was young, figuring out how things work has been one of my primary interests. Later in life, I would solve problems using calculus and advanced mathematics and also create works of original music.

In my constant journey of learning new concepts of which I thoroughly enjoy, I have found web development to be exciting. It's awesome to be able to create web applications that are useful and to be able to share them with the world.

Projects

Keyboards Etc

Built using AngularJS 1.5 components, Node, and SQL. This is an e-commerce site where users are able to order products with payments processed using Stripe.
Website     Github

Vimeo Clone

Built using AngularJS, Node, and uses Vimeo's developer API. Users are able to search for and upload videos, and post comments on videos. These changes are then reflected on the user's Vimeo Account.
Website     Github

The Solar System

Built using AngularJS, Node, & SQL. Displays information about the planets in the solar system by clicking on the planet images. Data is displayed sequentially by using the $timeout service in AngularJS.
Website     Github


Adventure App

Built using AngularJS & Node. Uses Axios in the backend to fetch data from an API containing arrays of coordinate data. Uses the Google maps API to plot those points on an interactive map.
Website     Github

The Toolbox

Built using AngularJS and Node. Uses a third-party API for currency exchangerates. Contains useful tools: currency converter, calculator, stopwatch, and a timer.
Website     Github

Youtube App

Built using ReactJS and Node. Uses a proxy so the backend can communicate with the front-end. Uses Axios to make http requests to the Youtube API so users can search for videos.
Website     Github


Feedback App

Built using ReactJS, Redux, & Node. This is an App for start-ups to be able to send out survey emails to clients for receiving feedback. Authentication is done through Google using passport.js.
Website     Github

Weather App

Built using ReactJS, Redux, & Node. Retrieves data from the Open Maps API to display weather data from any city searched for. Uses the Google Maps API to display the map.
Website     Github

Blogger

Built using ReactJS, Redux, Redux-Form, and Node. Retrieves a list of blog posts from a third-party API and allows users to view and delete posts when logged in.
Website     Github
